name: 99 Grid Puzzle
description:
99 grid puzzle is a simple but addicting app, don't doubt. Its the perfect little game to pick up and play when you have a spare moment.

The goal is to uncover all the grids while avoiding the mines. 
The rules are simple: A number indicates the total number of mines on the 8 grids around it. Long pressing to mark as grid as being a mine.

FEATURES:
- Challenge the best with time mode
- Single tap or long press
- 3 difficulty levels
- Flag tiles with long press
- Sounds and music
- Achievement
- Auto placement of cards to goal cells

DIFFICULTIES:
- Beginner 6x9 with 8 mines
- Intermediate 8x11 with 12 mines
- Expert 10x14 with 24 mines
